CBS has announced. Mitt Romney , who was a 2008 Republican presidential candidate, is to appear on the program Tuesday. He is promoting the publication of the paperback version of his book, No Apology: Believe in America. This will be Mitt Romney 's second visit to the CBS broadcast. He previously sat down for an interview with David Letterman on the`` Late Show'' last March 2, the network noted. Also

by the data from the three newer large rail metropolitan areas( see the section`` Rail and Traffic Congestion'' above). Congestion Cost Savings. The conclusion of`` Washington's War'' was that work-trip travel times are longer and traffic congestion is more intense in the large-rail metropolitan areas than in the 43 metropolitan areas without intense rail systems. The costs of lost time( including longer travel times due to congestion and the excess time of transit travel) are thus higher in large-rail metropolitan areas. Further, these longer travel times retard economic and employment growth and result in higher rates of unemployment for lower-income households. ( Emphasis added.)
